jd.text: Keen interest in integrating machine learning models for personalized content recommendation.
Proven experience building web applications and browser extensions using Javascript, NextJS, and other modern frameworks.
Experience in building native mobile/tablet apps for both iOS and Android.
Familiarity with Firebase/Firestore, GraphQL, Rust, Typescript, and Python.
Basic knowledge in AI/ML for recommendation systems.
Ideally located in San Francisco, but remote work is allowed from any time zone, with a daily standup at 8 PM PT.
Glasp aims to seamlessly allow people to highlight and organize quotes and ideas from the web and simultaneously access other like-minded people’s learning.
Utilizes generative AI to offer personalized outputs such as a writing assistant, research assistant, personalized summary, digital twins, and more.
Provides applications through a Chrome Extension, Safari Extension, and is in the process of building a mobile/tablet app.
Media exposure includes notable outlets like Forbes, The Economic Times, PC Gamer, Ness Labs, etc.
Team structure includes a co-founder, software engineer, and a design & backend expert working on strengthening browser extensions and web applications.
To democratize access to other people’s learning and experiences, visualizing one’s contribution to human knowledge history.
To provide access to the highlighted world’s information in one click.
Emphasis on a flexible and collaborative remote working environment.
Strong value on constant communication and daily syncs for efficient teamwork.
3-month probation period to ensure a mutually beneficial partnership.
